strapiPost.title: CHEER LIVE Coming To NWA
strapiPost.content:
CHEER LIVE is coming to Northwest Arkansas to perform at the Walmart AMP on June 8 and tickets go on sale Friday, Feb. 4. 

  • Stunts: CHEER is a 2-season Netflix documentary series about two cheer teamâ€™s journeys to National Cheerleading Championships. CHEER LIVE will be bringing the show to life with routines from the top athletes from Navarro College and Trinity Valley Community College.
  • Staged: The production is the first of its kind as a premier athletic event staged with never-seen-before stunts and performances. The event will also feature 14-time national champion coach and best-selling author, Monica Aldama.

For more information and tickets click HERE.
